ModMetaData.name: Psyfocus Syringes
ModMetaData.author: ShadowSWilliam
ModMetaData.description:
Adds usable syringes that recharge the psyfocus of the user by a specific value. Currently, only one syringe exists. The existing syringe is a quest reward, and recharges 100% psyfocus on use.
In the future, there will be a craftable variant that recharges less, aswell as craftable empty syringes and possibly additional syringe "fillings" of all kinds!
